name: Log Food
description: Log food you ate using the LangGraph Food Agent. The agent will ask for required details like location (home/outside), preference (liked/disliked/favorite), and restaurant name if eating outside.
author: AI Stack

message.description: Natural language description of what you ate (e.g., 'I had pizza at Joe's Pizza, it was my favorite')

examples.prompt: I had pizza at Joe's Pizza and it was amazing
examples.call: {"message": "I had pizza at Joe's Pizza and it was amazing"}

examples.prompt: Log that I ate homemade pasta for dinner, I liked it
examples.call: {"message": "I ate homemade pasta for dinner, I liked it"}

examples.prompt: I had a burger outside at Five Guys, it was my favorite
examples.call: {"message": "I had a burger outside at Five Guys, it was my favorite"}
